translation.en: [woman] Are we having a boy or a girl?
-[doctor] You sure you want to know? -Yes.
-Is everything gonna be OK? -Your baby boy is healthy.
-We got months to get ready. -Yeah. I'm not worried about that.
translation.ko: - 몇 달 동안 준비할 시간이 있어 - 그럼, 걱정 안 하지

translation.en: Good. Then you shouldn't worry about tonight either.
Right. 'Cause asking Tom Sutherland for his daughter's hand
translation.ko: 그럼, 톰 서덜랜드 씨께 따님을 달라고 하는 게

translation.en: -is gonna be a walk in the park. -Would you rather tell him I'm pregnant?
Yeah. At least we'll have something to talk about this time.
translation.ko: 그래, 그래도 이번에는 할 얘기는 있겠다

translation.en: Nothing to be afraid of. Just don't bring up the boat.
translation.ko: 무서워할 거 없어 보트 얘기만 하지 마

translation.en: I try not to bring up the boat,
translation.ko: 보트 얘기는 안 하려고 할 건데

translation.en: but then I get nervous and I end up bringing up the boat.
-He restored it himself, Will. -Yeah, I am aware of that little detail.
translation.ko: - 아빠가 직접 복원한 보트였어 - 그건 나도 알지

translation.en: -OK, I'll call you from the airport. Bye. -Yeah.
OK, I think it's gonna be easy enough to get things going between us.
translation.ko: 좋아, 우리끼리 일하면 쉽게 풀릴 것 같아

translation.en: Hey, there. Mr. and Mrs. Sutherland.
-Hi. Good to see you. -Hi. Good to see you, too.
I was just about to fix myself another drink.
Why don't you see if Paula can use a little hand in the kitchen?
-Anything I can do to help? -Oh, no. You're our guest.
-Why don't you have a seat? -Thank you.
How we looking at time, hon?
Not too long. Enjoy your scotch.
I think it was five, actually.
Sam has the same photo in our loft.
You came with us. How could I forget that?
translation.ko: 자네도 같이 왔었지 그걸 어떻게 잊겠나?

translation.en: Took me almost as long to make that one as it did the original.
translation.ko: 진짜 배를 만드는 것만큼이나 오래 걸렸네

translation.en: Why don't you put her back down, Will? Let's just stay on the safe side. Alright?
translation.ko: 내려놓지 그래, 윌? 안전한 편이 낫잖아?

translation.en: Sam mentioned that the two of you are thinking about
-finding a house. -We're talking about it, yeah.
translation.ko: - 집을 알아보고 있다면서? - 네, 의논 중이에요

translation.en: You know, at some point in the future it'd be nice to have some more room.
-Here you go. -I am of two minds about it, you know?
-What are you of two minds about? -Providing assistance.
translation.ko: - 두 가지가 어떤 건데요? - 도움을 주는 거

translation.en: I need a guarantee that if it doesn't work out,
translation.ko: 확실히 해두고 싶은 건 일이 잘 안 풀릴 경우

translation.en: you can't make any claims to the money that I put down. Nothing personal, Will.
translation.ko: 내가 준 돈에 자네 몫은 없다는 거네, 자네가 싫어서는 아니야

translation.en: Sorry, I'm a little confused. Did Sam ask you for help?
translation.ko: 잠시만요, 좀 헷갈리네요 샘이 도와달라고 하던가요?

translation.en: No, don't worry about any of that, Will. We've helped her brother, Steven, too.
translation.ko: 아니, 아무 걱정하지 마 오빠인 스티븐도 우리가 도와줬어

translation.en: You know that I'm making good money on this job, right?
translation.ko: 저도 돈 꽤 잘 버는 거 아시죠?

translation.en: If memory serves, you were unemployed before you moved to Seattle. Sam had to
translation.ko: 시애틀로 이사하기 전에는 백수였던 걸로 기억하는데?

translation.en: -support both of you for a while there. -No, Sam didn't have to--
translation.ko: - 샘이 한동안 먹여 살렸잖아 - 아니, 그럴 필요는 없었는데...

translation.en: You know, like I said, work's good.
you know, when it makes sense, when...
when it's the right time, then I'll open my own practice. But...
translation.ko: 기회를 봐서 제 사무실을 열 생각입니다만...

translation.en: Well, in the meantime, we're fine.
-That's great. -Doesn't sound like much of a plan, Will.
Problem with your generation is that nobody wants to work for it.
translation.ko: 꿈을 이루려고 아무도 노력하지 않는다는 게 자네 세대의 문제야

translation.en: I spent 27 years serving our country.
I saved and I saved until I started working for Northbridge,
where I started making some real money. But...
You know, I have never asked anyone for any help.
And you're not asking for anything now.
translation.ko: 자네가 우리한테 뭘 요구한다는 게 아니야

translation.en: We're just offering to help our daughter.
translation.ko: 그냥 우리가 우리 딸을 도와주려는 거지

translation.en: Why did you move to Seattle?
because he thought it would be easier.
translation.ko: 그편이 쉬울 거로 생각해서 이사한 것 같거든

translation.en: Because he thought it would be more secure
translation.ko: 내 딸을 내 곁에서 멀리 떨어뜨리면

translation.en: if he moved my daughter away from me.
You know what, I doubt that. Sam would have told me that.
translation.ko: 난 못 믿겠네 그랬다면 샘이 얘기했겠지

translation.en: You think she would have told you that she wanted to move away
to start her life on her own terms with me,
without her father breathing down her fucking neck all the time?
translation.ko: 저와 함께 자기만의 인생을 시작하고 싶다고요?

translation.en: Say what you've gotta say, spit it out. Let us know how you really feel, Will.
translation.ko: 하고 싶은 말 있으면 다 하게 자네 진짜 생각을 말해 봐, 윌

translation.en: Get it off your chest, but just don't swear in front of my wife.
translation.ko: 솔직히 말해보게 내 아내 앞에서 욕만 하지 마

translation.en: Whose table do you think you're sitting at?
Sweetheart, it's getting late. Let me walk you out.
translation.ko: 너무 늦은 것 같네 내가 배웅해 줄게

translation.en: I was just lying down after the gym.
Yeah, I don't think so. You look like shit.
translation.ko: 아닌 것 같은데 상태가 말이 아니야

translation.en: Fuck, fuck, fuck, fuck, fuck, fuck, fuck.
Wait, wait. What did she say?
What do you think she said?
Yeah, OK. I'm sorry, alright? I'm sorry, but, Sam, look,
he was into me from the second I got in, OK? I guarantee you
if I'd asked for his blessing last night, he would have said no. So I didn't.
translation.ko: 어제 허락해 달라고 여쭤봤다가는 안 된다고 할 분위기라 말 안 했어

translation.en: -My mother asked you to leave. -No, no, she didn't.
translation.ko: - 엄마가 나가라고 했다며 - 아니야, 안 그러셨어

translation.en: It wasn't quite like that. She didn't ask me to leave.
translation.ko: 그런 게 아니라니까 나가라고 안 하셨어

translation.en: I'm really, really fucking late, OK? I gotta go.
OK, fine. Just call me when you get to the airport.
-Sam, what the hell is that? -[static] I'm scared.
Come on, Sam. Hi, it's me. I'm at the airport. Give me a call.
[announcer] Flight 23 to Seattle is delayed until further notice.
[reporter] We have some breaking news for you right now.
We have unconfirmed reports this morning
translation.ko: 오늘 아침 남부 캘리포니아 연안 지역에서

translation.en: of a large seismic event off the southern California coast.
translation.ko: 대규모 지진이 발생했다는 확인되지 않은 소식입니다

translation.en: We currently don't have contact with our Los Angeles bureau.
translation.ko: 현재 엘에이 지부와 통신이 연결되고 있지 않습니다

translation.en: We're now getting news of power outages
across the western part of the United States,
and reports of telecommunication outages as well.
I want to stress this is all preliminary.
We are reporting this just as we are learning it.
translation.ko: 새로운 소식이 들어오는 대로 뉴스를 전해드리고 있습니다

translation.en: We do not yet have any information on damages or casualties.
translation.ko: 피해 규모나 사상자에 대한 정보는 아직 확인되지 않았습니다

translation.en: Two hundred bucks. Back to the city.
Hey, it's me again. Call me as soon as you get this, alright?
translation.ko: 또 나야 이거 들으면 바로 전화해줘

translation.en: I guess that answers that question.
We thought that there was a chance that you flew back.
They shut down O'Hare. I didn't know where else to go.
translation.ko: 오헤어 공항을 폐쇄했는데 달리 갈 데가 없어서요

translation.en: Well, have you talked to Sam? I haven't been able to reach her.
translation.ko: 샘이랑 통화했어? 전화 연결이 안 돼

translation.en: Yeah. I was on the phone to her when it happened.
translation.ko: 네, 일이 터졌을 때 전화하고 있었는데

translation.en: I heard something, so did she.
-What did you hear? -I don't know. It was like a...
Like a loud rumble or something. I didn't know what it was. And then...
translation.ko: 우르릉거리는 소리가 크게 났는데 무슨 소리인지 모르겠어요

translation.en: -What's the last thing she said? -She said something's wrong.
Alright, I'm gonna go pack up the rest of my things. Yours are on the table.
translation.ko: 나는 가서 짐을 마저 쌀게요 당신 건 식탁 위에 있어요

translation.en: -I should head back to the airport. -I thought you said they shut it down.
translation.ko: - 저는 다시 공항으로 갈게요 - 폐쇄됐다고 했잖나

translation.en: Yeah, but once the power comes back on, there'll be flights, right?
translation.ko: 네, 그렇지만 전기가 복구되면 비행기가 뜨지 않을까요?

translation.en: Let's look at what we know, Will.
translation.ko: 윌, 알고 있는 걸 한번 생각해보라고

translation.en: There was an event, a couple of hours ago, out west.
The power shut off here, two thousand miles away.
We have no idea what's happening, yet we've got F-22s doing flybys.
translation.ko: 무슨 일인지도 모르는데 F-22가 에어쇼를 하듯 날아다니네

translation.en: This moment is not about waiting for the power to come back on.
translation.ko: 지금은 전기가 복구되길 기다리고 있을 때가 아니야

translation.en: The only thing that we can control is what we decide to do.
translation.ko: 지금 통제할 수 있는 건 우리 결정뿐이네

translation.en: So, what? What are you saying? What are you gonna do?
What, you're gonna drive to Seattle?
I only have one question for you.
-I love you. Be safe. -You'll be alright.
How can cell service still be out?
Fill her up with gas, I'll go get supplies.
translation.ko: 기름 넣고 있게 나는 필요한 것 좀 살게

translation.en: Wanna show me the back seat?
-What are you talking about? -What's going on, Liza?
-This piece of shit just called me a slut. -What? Whoa, no, no.
translation.ko: - 이 자식이 나한테 걸레라고 했어 - 뭐요? 아니에요...

translation.en: Hey, I didn't call you a slut.
I think this is gonna fucking cost you, man.
-That's my car. -Shut the fuck up, old man!
translation.ko: - 그거 내 차야 - 꺼져, 이 늙은이야

translation.en: -Come on, I know you got some cash. -All right.
-Jesus Christ, Tom. -Get back in the car, Will.
translation.ko: - 세상에, 톰 - 윌, 차에 가 있어

translation.en: Start running and don't look back!
Is there something you want to say?
-Told you what? -Told me that you had a gun.
And what would you have said, Will?
I'm assuming that you've never fired a firearm before.
translation.ko: 총 쏴본 적도 없을 것 같은데

translation.en: No, I haven't used a firearm, but it's not exactly a priority in my law firm, is it?
translation.ko: 없어요, 변호사에게 그런 게 필요할 리가 없잖아요

translation.en: You know what, Will, what if they had taken this car?
translation.ko: 그 자식들이 이 차를 가져갔으면 어쩔 뻔했나?

translation.en: Game over. It would be game over!
Well, something must be going on if they're not letting us through.
translation.ko: 못 가게 한다면 정말로 무슨 일이 있는 거겠죠

translation.en: -Is there another way? -No. We need this road.
translation.ko: - 다른 길이 있나요? - 아니, 이 길로 가야 해

translation.en: Sir, the road's closed ahead. Follow the other cars. Thank you.
translation.ko: 도로가 폐쇄됐습니다 다른 차 따라가세요, 감사합니다

translation.en: I'm sorry, Sergeant. But we got a lot of miles in front of us,
translation.ko: 병장님, 죄송합니다만 저희가 좀 멀리 가야 하는데

translation.en: and you're shutting down the biggest highway in the country.
translation.ko: 나라에서 제일 큰 도로를 막으면 어떡합니까?

translation.en: Public safety issue, sir. On account of the power outage.
No help for you out there if you have a flat or an accident.
translation.ko: 타이어가 터지거나 사고가 나도 도움받을 곳이 없어요

translation.en: -What are you doing? -Can I just have a word, Sergeant?
translation.ko: - 뭐 하십니까? - 병장님, 얘기 좀 해도 됩니까?

translation.en: I understand you got a job to do.
And I know you got orders. I've been there.
translation.ko: 명령을 따른다는 것도 압니다 나도 그랬어요

translation.en: I spent the better part of my adult life in the Marine Corps.
We'd be on our own, I understand.
But my daughter's a long ways in that direction.
translation.ko: 그렇지만 내 딸이 저쪽 멀리 있어요

translation.en: I'm asking, can you help me?
Let the Caddy through! Local traffic, lives past the next exit.
translation.ko: 차 통과시켜! 다음 출구 지나서 국도로 빠질 거다

translation.en: Apparently, we're not the only ones heading west.
translation.ko: 우리만 서쪽으로 가는 건 확실히 아닌 것 같네

translation.en: The F-22s, the road block. What is this?
Jesus Christ. I didn't even see him coming.
He probably can't run our plates.
translation.ko: 경찰도 번호판 조회를 못 할 거예요

translation.en: I'm gonna check it out, OK?
-Is there a problem, Officer? -Get back in the car!
Will! Get back in the car!
Tell your friend to get out of the fucking car!
translation.ko: 당신 친구도 차에서 당장 나오라고 해!

translation.en: -OK. Fuck. -Tell him to get out of the fucking car!
Will, let's go! Go, go, go!
Fuck. Get the ammo for the SIG in the trunk!
-What? It wasn't loaded before? -I didn't need it to be.
translation.ko: - 네? 장전한 거 아니었어요? - 그럴 필요가 없었거든

translation.en: Will, just get the ammo out of the go bag.
You see the black bag? Little black bag?
-Yeah, I got it. He's coming! -Take it out.
Put the mag into the weapon.
-How do I do it? -Put the mag in the gun.
Hit the button on the side. Shoot. You gotta do it. Shoot.
translation.ko: 옆에 버튼을 누르고 쏴! 그냥 쏴버려!

translation.en: -Fuck, it's not working! What do I do? -Pull it back! Put it in the chamber!
translation.ko: - 안 돼요! 어떻게 해요? - 잡아당겨! 약실에 집어넣으라고!

translation.en: Put the bullet in the chamber. Pull the top back.
translation.ko: 총알을 약실에 집어넣고 윗부분을 뒤로 잡아당겨

translation.en: -See if you have a cartridge inside. -Fuck!
Get out of the car, faggot. Now.
I think I broke my ribs.
We're gonna need to find a garage.
We were... We've been in an accident.
-You guys even know where you are? -No.
-We were hoping for your help. -You guys got money?
-I ain't doing shit for free. -Nor should you.
If you need new parts, I can't help you.
translation.ko: 새 부품이 필요한 거면 못 도와줘요

translation.en: -Understood. -Restroom's all the way in the back.
Hey! I told you not to fuck with them!
translation.ko: 야! 저 사람들이랑 엮이지 말라고 했잖아!

translation.en: Who the fuck do you think you are?
[man] So, all cell service goes out.
Virtually all communications, except local ham radio like us or short wave.
translation.ko: 아마추어 무선과 단파를 제외한 모든 통신이 끊겼어요

translation.en: But how does that happen, huh? US Government goes virtually silent?
translation.ko: 어떻게 이런 일이 있죠? 정부는 갑자기 조용해진 걸까요?

translation.en: Are we talking World War Three? Like a nuke attack that went sideways?
translation.ko: 3차 세계대전을 얘기하는 겁니까? 핵 공격으로 난리가 난 걸까요?

translation.en: I mean, the damned president's doing a massive cover-up.
translation.ko: 대통령이라는 작자가 대대적인 은폐 공작을 했잖아요

translation.en: Military coup? Martial law? We don't know, we don't know.
If anyone out there who knows anything, get on short wave. Please, do it now.
translation.ko: 무슨 일인지 아는 분이 있으면 단파로 알려주세요, 지금 당장요

translation.en: -Is anyone out there? -[man] Two thousand satellites in space,
-all of them down? -[woman] Answer me, I--
[man] Government knows, man. They're just keeping it from us.
translation.ko: 정부는 알면서 우리한테 알려주지 않는 거겠죠

translation.en: I sealed the radiator. It should hold.
translation.ko: 냉각기에 찢어진 부분을 붙였어요 괜찮을 거예요

translation.en: -You can keep driving for a while. -A while?
Radiator isn't gonna break. Might start leaking again, though.
translation.ko: 냉각기가 망가지지는 않을 거고 다시 새기는 할 거예요

translation.en: I can give you some of the sealant, show you how to use it.
translation.ko: 밀폐제를 좀 드릴게요 어떻게 하는지도 알려주고요

translation.en: I'll gave you $200 for the labor.
And if we get to where we're going, I'll mail you another two.
Yeah. How about you give me that other two right now?
translation.ko: 그래요, 400불을 지금 다 주는 건 어때요?

translation.en: Is that your Buick out there?
No, I was gonna head out to California and get the fuck out of this place.
translation.ko: 아니요, 여기를 떠나서 캘리포니아에 가려고 했거든요

translation.en: But now all she needs is a new transmission, so she ain't for sale.
translation.ko: 지금은 변속기를 갈아야 해서 팔 수 없어요

translation.en: Then maybe you should come with us.
-I don't think so. -We're going out west.
Yeah? Why would I want to go with you?
translation.ko: 그래서요? 제가 왜 아저씨랑 가고 싶겠어요?

translation.en: You can keep the cash and be almost all the way to California.
translation.ko: 너는... 현금도 챙기고 캘리포니아 근처까지 가면 되잖니

translation.en: If you have any problems or a break down, you can fix it.
translation.ko: 중간에 망가지거나 문제가 생기면 네가 고치면 되고

translation.en: No disrespect, but I ain't about doing no road trip right now
translation.ko: 무례하게 굴려는 건 아닌데 어디서 왔는지도 모를

translation.en: with two shady dudes that appear out of nowhere.
translation.ko: 수상한 남자 둘이랑 자동차 여행을 할 생각은 없거든요

translation.en: Whoa, whoa. We're not shady, come on.
You two roll up in a fucked-up, shot up cop car that you say you found,
translation.ko: 찌그러진 경찰차에 다 망가진 캐딜락을 끌고 나타났잖아요

translation.en: towing a shot up Caddy, and...
You know, you got blood all over your face. So, yeah.
I hear you loud and clear. Doesn't look good.
I could tell you that it wasn't us.
we were you just defending ourselves. I could tell you
translation.ko: 우리는 방어한 것뿐이야 물론 무슨 일이 있었는지

translation.en: actually what happened, down to the very last detail, but...
translation.ko: 아주 자세하게 말해줄 수도 있어 그런데...

translation.en: if I were you, I'm not sure I would believe that either.
translation.ko: 내가 너라도 그 말을 믿을 수 있을지 모르겠구나

translation.en: But I can tell you this.
With a clear conscience, I can look you in the eye and I can say...
translation.ko: 네 눈을 똑바로 보고 떳떳하게 말할 수 있단다

translation.en: there's a lot to be afraid of out there.
translation.ko: 지금 밖에는 위험한 것들이 너무 많아

translation.en: None of us know how much.
We're just driving out west to see if we can find my daughter.
translation.ko: 딸을 찾으려고 함께 서부로 가고 있어

translation.en: I'll do it for two thousand.
As long as we don't snap an axle, I can get us to Seattle.
translation.ko: 차축이 끊어지지 않는 한 시애틀까지 갈 수 있어요

translation.en: Oh, and I siphoned the cop's gas.
-What are you doing? -I want us to be invisible from behind.
translation.ko: - 뭐 하세요? - 뒤에서 우리가 안 보이게 하려고

translation.en: -Here you go, Will. Drive the first shift. -OK.
Course Tonto rides in the fucking back.

translation.ko: 다시 안 오는 게 좋을 거야

translation.en: So, you guys got a radio signal?
Is there a frontage road to the 90? Another way west?
translation.ko: 90번과 연결되는 지선 도로 있나? 서쪽으로 가는 다른 길은?

translation.en: Take a left here. Can head out on the 14 West for a while.
translation.ko: 여기서 좌회전하세요 14번 서쪽 방면으로 쭉 가면 돼요

translation.en: What kinda music you guys into?
Yeah, I don't think it's that kind of road trip, Ricki.
translation.ko: 리키, 그럴만한 자동차 여행은 아닌 것 같은데

translation.en: Yeah, let him. He's gonna want to drive when he wakes up.
translation.ko: 응, 그냥 둬 일어나면 운전하려고 하실 거야

translation.en: So, his daughter... that's your girl?
translation.ko: 그럼 이 아저씨 딸이 아저씨 애인인가요?

translation.en: -They on our side of the road? -Jesus!
translation.ko: - 저 차 우리 차선으로 와요! - 뭐야!

translation.en: -I think it's a telephone number. -Will, let him be.
We're hours from a hospital, and this guy, he's not gonna make it.
translation.ko: 병원에 가려면 몇 시간 걸릴 텐데 그때까지 못 버텨

translation.en: Let's get back in the car. Let's go, guys. Let's go. Let's go.
You gotta stop the car for Ricki. Stop the car, Tom. Stop the fucking car!
translation.ko: 리키 태우게 멈춰요 톰, 차 멈추라고요!

translation.en: If Will hadn't told me to wait, I would've left you.
translation.ko: 윌이 기다리자고 안 했으면 나는 그냥 갔을 거다

translation.en: See if I fix your car if it breaks down again.
translation.ko: 차 고장 나면 내가 고치나 보자고요

translation.en: We had a deal. If you're not gonna honor it, you need to speak up now.
translation.ko: 약속했잖아 안 지킬 거면 지금 당장 얘기해

translation.en: Yeah, he can be pretty hard.
You don't know what hard is, man.
What? You don't think that I got it?
No, of course I do. I just, you know, I thought it was a pretty odd career path.
translation.ko: 그런 게 아니라 좀 특이한 진로인 것 같아서

translation.en: You ever seen clouds like that before?
-Go, go! Get in the car! -Get in!
translation.ko: - 어서 가! 차에 타! - 얼른 타!

translation.en: You see the bridge? Do you see it?
What the fuck is going on?
-Never seen a storm like this. -This is crazy.
translation.ko: - 이런 폭풍은 처음 봐요 - 완전히 미쳤군

translation.en: [man] ...as much information as we can, for as long as we can.
For as long as this generator will let us.
translation.ko: 저희가 알고 있는 모든 정보를 알려드리겠습니다

translation.en: Still no internet. No cell service. No nothing.
translation.ko: 아직 인터넷, 휴대폰 서비스 모두 복구되지 않았습니다

translation.en: You're gonna want to stay on the 17.
I have friends in Ashland Heights. I already checked.
We can stop there. We can resupply.
translation.ko: 여기 들러서 필요한 걸 좀 챙기죠

translation.en: We can resupply anywhere. We don't wanna go out of our way.
translation.ko: 다른 데서 챙겨도 되네 길을 벗어나지 않는 게 좋아

translation.en: Look, why don't we just stop, OK?
Ricki can check the car and my friends can help us.
translation.ko: 리키가 차도 점검하고 친구가 우리를 도와줄 수도 있고요

translation.en: -You just drive. I got the plans. -I said they're friends, Tom.
translation.ko: - 운전이나 해, 다 계획이 있어 - 친구라고요, 톰

translation.en: They're not just my friends, they're Sam's friends.
translation.ko: 그냥 제 친구가 아니라 샘의 친구예요

translation.en: No services here. No gas, no nothing.
We've been on the road for a long time. A good friend of mine lives in the town.
translation.ko: 운전을 너무 오래 해서 그래요 친한 친구가 여기 삽니다

translation.en: Every car that stops here says they got friends in this little town.
translation.ko: 오는 사람마다 이 작은 마을에 친구가 있다고 합디다

translation.en: His name's Adam Dumont. He was born and raised here.
translation.ko: 애덤 듀몬트요 여기서 나고 자란 친구예요

translation.en: I was a groomsman at his wedding.
My girlfriend and I have been here, like, half a dozen times.
she owns a pottery store in town. I can't remember what the name of it is.
translation.ko: 시내에서 도자기 가게를 해요 가게 이름은 기억이 안 나네요

translation.en: We just wanna get off the road for a couple of hours and then we'll be gone.
Find an escort for these boys over to the Dumonts'.
And make sure, they get turned away, they come straight back here.
[man on radio] Is it North Korea? Is it the Chinese?
Who else could do this? Who else would do this?
translation.ko: 아니면 누가 이럴 수 있죠? 누가 그러려고 할까요?

translation.en: Damn it. Maybe they're in it together.
translation.ko: 젠장 둘이 짜고 그럴 수도 있죠

translation.en: We do know they hate us.
translation.ko: 둘 다 우리를 싫어한다는 건 알죠

translation.en: How did you even get here?
This is Tom, Sam's dad. And Ricki in the back.
translation.ko: 여긴 톰, 샘의 아버지셔 뒤에는 리키야

translation.en: Hey. We should all go inside.
I'm gonna take a couple of minutes to check out the car and get organized.
translation.ko: 차 점검하고 정리도 할 겸 몇 분 있다가 들어갈게

translation.en: The Bible says, "The earth knew not
until the flood came and took them...
When was last time you heard from Adam?
I guess the night before it all, so...
translation.ko: 그 일이 있기 전날 밤이었을 거야

translation.en: He's... He's on a business trip to San Francisco.
Well, if anyone's gonna be OK, it's Adam.
I mean, none of this makes any sense. It's just that...
translation.ko: 이건 정말 말이 안 돼 그냥...

translation.en: These fucking storms and then this heat. And we've been having earthquakes.
translation.ko: 폭풍에 이 더위까지... 지진도 계속 났었어

translation.en: It's just... I mean, it's so crazy that you're here and...
translation.ko: 내 말은... 네가 여기까지 오다니 정말...

translation.en: it can't stay like this forever.
Really? Do you really think that?
-Sorry. I haven't been sleeping and it... -No, it's fine, It's OK.
translation.ko: - 미안, 잠을 못 자서... - 아니, 괜찮아

translation.en: Do you want to take a shower? We still have plenty of water.
-Need help? -Nah, I just got one more left.
translation.ko: - 도와드려요? - 아니, 하나만 더 하면 돼

translation.en: How do we not know anything?
translation.ko: 어떻게 우리가 아무것도 모를 수가 있지?

translation.en: Doesn't that tell you something, Will? If they were all right, we would know.
translation.ko: 무슨 의미인지 알아, 윌? 살아있다면 우리가 알고 있어야지

translation.en: I just... None of this is real. It can't be real.
translation.ko: 아무것도 믿기지 않아 이게 현실일 리가 없어

translation.en: No one's telling me anything and...
and no one even knows that I'm here.
translation.ko: 내가 여기 있는 걸 아는 사람도 없겠지

translation.en: Adam knows you're here. And he's coming back for you. I know that.
translation.ko: 애덤은 알고 있어 너한테 다시 올 거야, 내가 알아

translation.en: Because I can feel it, Will.
I can feel that he's gone.
-I can feel it in my bones. I know it. -No, no, no. Just...
And I know that Sam is gone, Will. She's gone!
We are gonna be fine. OK?
Adam is coming back for you.
We need to load the supplies in the car.
Let's see if there's anything useful down there.
Holy shit! Holy fuck! It's hot in there!
I thought it was gonna be cold.
-It's not funny. -It kinda is a little bit funny.
OK. We're gonna need to split up.
I just think it's funny that the Army
named its helicopters after tribes they tried to wipe out.
translation.ko: 군대가 말살시키려고 했던 부족을 헬리콥터 이름으로 썼잖아요

translation.en: Look, Ricki. You're on gas detail.
Want you to grab the cans, check out the cars,
look at the generators, whatever you find. We're gonna go check out the diner.
translation.ko: 발전기든 뭐든 확인해 봐 우리는 식당을 살펴볼게

translation.en: So, what are we looking for?
Be sure to get what we need.
-I said get gas! -I already found some.
Cars had their tires slashed, but still had gas in the back.
Wake up. Both of you, wake up.
Check your phone. Ricki, check your phone. Tom, check your phone now.
translation.ko: 휴대폰 확인해, 리키 톰, 지금 확인해봐요

translation.en: I just heard. We got cell reception, I think.
translation.ko: 방금 들었는데 휴대폰 신호가 잡힌 거 같아요

translation.en: I love you. Can you hear me?
The message is two days old.
-Where the hell are they coming from? -I don't know.
-Jesus. We should turn around. -This road's the only way over the pass.
translation.ko: - 세상에, 차 돌려요 - 여기 말고는 길이 없어

translation.en: -This is a mistake. Why are we stopping? -I just want to see what's going on.
translation.ko: - 이러면 안 돼, 왜 서는 거야? - 무슨 일인지 확인해볼게요

translation.en: -You OK, lady? What happened? -I need help.
OK, why don't you just come to us. It's safer over here.
You just need to get in the car. It's safer in the car. Come on, come on.
translation.ko: 차에 들어가셔야 해요 차 안이 안전해요, 어서요

translation.en: -I just need help. -Where's your spare? Is it in the car?
I don't know. I don't know.

translation.ko: - 리키, 이리 와 - 저는 못 해요

translation.en: I can't. I don't know how. I need help.
translation.ko: 저는 할 줄 몰라요 좀 도와주세요

translation.en: -You happy? You happy now? -Go get it.
-What the fuck is he doing? -It's not personal.
translation.ko: - 뭐 하는 거야? - 댁한테 감정 없어

translation.en: -We all got places to be. -Stay calm.
Stay calm, all right? Stay calm.
-Open it. -It's locked and I don't have the key.
Don't. Don't fucking do it, man.
-Just leave us one canister, please. -Shut your fucking mouth.
translation.ko: - 제발 한 통만 남겨줘요 - 입 닥쳐

translation.en: Get the gas. Let's get the hell out of here.
Just get the gas. Let's fucking go, man.
Don't leave us here to die.
-Let's fucking go. -You're killing us. Don't take the gas!

translation.ko: - 갈비뼈 때문에 총도 못 들겠어 - 젠장
- 당신들 다! - 당신이 저 사람들을 도왔잖아요!

translation.en: -All right. Come on, get in the car. -Why'd you stop?
translation.ko: - 와서 차에 타요 - 왜 멈춘 거예요?

translation.en: -We're supposed to be decent. -Get in the car. We have to go right now!
translation.ko: - 사람이 그러면 안 되죠 - 차에 타요, 지금 가야 해요!

translation.en: I'm staying with him. I'm not leaving my husband like this. Not with you people!
translation.ko: 아니요, 남편을 이렇게 두고 당신 같은 사람이랑은 못 가요!

translation.en: We gotta go. If we don't catch them, we're dead. Come on, go.
translation.ko: 가야 해요, 저들을 붙잡지 못하면 죽는 거예요, 가요!

translation.en: -Come on, get in the car! -Let's go, Will. Can't lose them.
translation.ko: - 어서요, 차에 타요! - 가세, 뺏길 수는 없지

translation.en: Come on! Come on, damn it.
You go it. Shoot the tire, Ricki!
-I can't open it! -Let go of me!
-Come on, Ricki. Come on. Damn it! -I can't! He's holding it.
translation.ko: - 얼른, 리키 - 이 자식이 잡고 안 놔요

translation.en: We're running out of time. Go, go. Come on!
-I can't pull over here, Ricki. -I said pull over.
translation.ko: - 여기서 세울 수는 없어, 리키 - 세우라고요

translation.en: They robbed us, Ricki. They were gonna kill us.
translation.ko: 우리 걸 훔쳤잖아, 리키 우릴 죽이려고 했어

translation.en: You saved us. That's the truth.
translation.ko: 네가 우리를 살린 거야 그게 진실이야

translation.en: -You did a good thing. -Yeah? For what?
So I can do this all over again?
translation.ko: 이런 일을 또 할 수 있어서요?

translation.en: It's another fucking thousand miles to Seattle.
-It's OK. It's OK. -I'm not gonna shoot you!
I'd rather go back to the fucking rez than spend another minute here with you.
translation.ko: 아저씨랑 있느니 보호 구역에 다시 돌아가는 편이 낫겠어요!

translation.en: We're in the middle of fucking nowhere.
You think that I wouldn't make it?
Who do you think's been taking care of me since the day that I was born?
translation.ko: 태어난 날부터 나를 돌봐준 사람이 누구였을 것 같아요?

translation.en: We'll survive this longer than you.
translation.ko: 아저씨보다 내가 더 오래 버틸 거예요

translation.en: -Fuck both you guys. -Ricki, OK, let's just take a...
We're gonna take a second, all right? And we're gonna rest here.
translation.ko: 좀 쉬자, 알겠지? 여기서 쉬었다 가자
우린 너 때문에 살았어 그걸 기억해

translation.en: Let's just give her a minute.
Should never have asked her to come with us.

translation.ko: - 톰, 무슨 일이에요? - 숨을 못 쉬겠어

translation.en: -All right. Let's get some help right now. -No time. My lungs are collapsing.
translation.ko: - 도와줄 사람이 있을 거예요 - 시간이 없네, 기흉이야

translation.en: -Gotta let the pressure out. -OK. How, how would--
-What you want me to do? -Put it in.
your father left you. That's ugly.
And you were just a kid, right?
I guess. He lives in Idaho now with his new family. I see him...
translation.ko: 그럴걸요, 새 가족이랑 아이다호에서 살고 계세요

translation.en: It's a shame that you never got to meet my father.
translation.ko: 자네가 우리 아버지를 만나야 했는데 말이야

translation.en: Sam must have told you some stories about him.
He had this... had this look,
when he thought you crossed the line.
It wasn't in disappointment, you know?
'cause he was disgusted at the fact that he brought you into the world.
translation.ko: 저런 걸 세상에 태어나게 했나 하고 역겨워하는 표정이었지

translation.en: I mean, in his heart, he was a good man.
I don't know if I'm a good father.
You know I love your daughter.
If I didn't think that, I would have killed you a long time ago.
translation.ko: 아니라는 걸 알았으면 진작에 자네를 죽였을 거야

translation.en: You'll be on your own soon.
I need to ask your word on something.
Yeah, of course, anything. Whatever you want.
that you'll always keep her safe.
of course I will. I promise you.
there's something I need to tell you.
No, no. You don't know this, Tom. No, you don't know.
What do you mean you know? How'd you know?
Paula, she called her after our dinner,
Said that you're having a baby boy!
I got to tell you something else, too.
I got to tell you about the boat.
Seriously? You know, why don't you quit while you're ahead on this.
You know all that shit you gave me,
The really funny thing is you...
you think it was me that was driving that boat when it crashed into the rock.
translation.ko: 보트가 바위랑 충돌할 때 제가 운전한 줄 아시겠지만

translation.en: -Get out! It was Sam? -Yeah. Hell, yeah.
drunk as anything. I mean, we both were and...
you know, when we came down in the morning,
and we see the boat, it had sunk to the bottom of the fucking lake, I mean...
I thought it was the right thing to do, you know
You're gonna be a good father.
Maybe we can get some help here.
No, no, no, no, no, no, no.
My friend is sick. He needs a doctor.
All right, we're coming. Just don't shoot.
-Wait, we can't go over there. -Yeah, no shit, Tom.
translation.ko: - 잠깐, 저쪽으로 갈 수는 없어 - 그건 안 되죠, 톰

translation.en: When I say three, I want you to swerve to your left.
I'm going west, trying to get to Seattle.
We've been staying off the interstate. It's not safe.
All right, we'll take you as far as we can.
I got family in the car.
Do you have any idea what happened?
Started in Los Angeles. Or at least...
They're saying go to Canada. Something about the air.
translation.ko: 캐나다로 가라고 하더군요 공기에 뭐가 있나 봐요

translation.en: -It's been three days now? -No. Today's day five.
Yeah, yeah. It's my father's place.
There's bedrooms upstairs if you want to rest.
translation.ko: 위층에 침실이 있는데 쉬고 싶으시면 쓰세요

translation.en: And hopefully there's some food in the kitchen, take a look.
translation.ko: 부엌에 먹을 게 있나 한번 둘러 보세요

translation.en: Look, I just want to say
There's about three weeks of food here.
Generator last will you five days, maybe more if you're conservative.
translation.ko: 발전기가 5일은 갈 거예요 아껴 쓰면 더 갈지도 모르고요

translation.en: There's one car in the garage, but I had to siphon off most of the gas.
translation.ko: 차고에 차가 1대 있는데 기름을 거의 뺐어요

translation.en: But if you look around, you're gonna find enough to get north.
translation.ko: 주위를 찾아보면 북쪽에 갈 만한 차를 찾을 수 있을 거예요

translation.en: But I need to leave right now.
And I need a four-wheel drive.
Which means I need to take your Jeep.
That's the deal that I'm offering.
He's our neighbor, Will. Put your guns down!
You know, I wouldn't have made it without him.
And I did everything I could. I did everything.
translation.ko: 할 수 있는 건 다 했어

translation.en: I'm never gonna leave you again.
You know, when I saw Seattle, I didn't think that...
translation.ko: 시애틀 상태를 보고 샘이 살아있을 줄은...

translation.en: before the police were just yelling at everybody to evacuate.
translation.ko: 그러고 나서 경찰이 다 대피하라고 소리쳤죠

translation.en: I mean, you could see the Sound
and the water retreat. I've never seen anything like that before.
translation.ko: 보일 정도였다니까요 그런 건 생전 처음 봤어요

translation.en: We were a couple miles inland by the time the waves hit.
translation.ko: 바닷물이 들이닥쳤을 때 우린 내륙 몇 킬로미터 안에 있었어

translation.en: And just so you know, Will...
I don't think this was an earthquake.
I've seen tons of war games simulations,
to erase rational behavior with what appears to be a singular incident.
translation.ko: 하나로 보이는 사건을 시작으로 이성적 판단을 못 하게 만들죠

translation.en: What the fuck you talking about?
-Look, I'm not trying to upset you. -You're not upsetting me.
translation.ko: - 화나게 하려는 게 아니에요 - 화 안 났어요

translation.en: I know the last couple days have been rough on you.
translation.ko: 지난 며칠 동안 힘들었던 거 알아요

translation.en: I mean, come on, you don't really believe this bullshit, do you?
translation.ko: 정말로 그런 말도 안 되는 걸 믿는 건 아니겠죠?

translation.en: I just drove across the fucking country. You can't create things that I've seen.
translation.ko: 이제 막 차로 대륙을 건넜다고요 그런 걸 누가 만들 수는 없어요

translation.en: -Seriously, are you fucking with me? -No, I'm not fucking with you.
translation.ko: - 진짜로 나랑 장난해요? - 그런 거 아니에요

translation.en: Think about it in laymen's terms. A nuclear bomb goes off the coast.
Then a virus takes down the grid before anyone can figure out what happened.
translation.ko: 무슨 일인지 아무도 모르는 사이에 바이러스가 망을 해체하는 거죠

translation.en: -I've seen the intel. -You haven't seen it. There is no intel.
translation.ko: - 그런 정보를 봤어요 - 그런 적도, 정보 따위도 없어요

translation.en: -That is fucking bullshit. -The bomb plays like an earthquake.
translation.ko: - 완전 헛소리일 뿐이에요 - 폭탄을 지진이라고 느끼는 거죠

translation.en: But the power going out, that created the chaos.
Don't you think it's strange that...
the power just went out everywhere?
The communications? I mean, just fucking think about it, man.
Unless, I don't know, I don't know. Maybe he believes in coincidences.
translation.ko: 이게 다 우연이라고 생각하지 않는다면 말이에요

translation.en: I'm gonna clean up here. all right?
And we can talk about all this in the morning, all right?
When you've had a good rest and you're feeling better, OK?
translation.ko: 잘 쉬고 컨디션도 좋을 때요 알겠죠?

translation.en: You know, there was an ash cloud over the ocean.
God knows how many other cities.
I don't know what the fuck is going on,
translation.ko: 무슨 일이 일어난 건지 나는 몰라요

translation.en: and you do not know what the fuck is going on either.
So, let's not pretend that you do, OK?
They happen all the time now.
Well, in the end, it doesn't really matter, I guess.
We all have to live, right?
Can I see that SIG of yours?
Be nicer with bullets, though, right?
I know he helped you, but he just...
translation.ko: 자기를 도와준 건 아는데 저 친구는...

translation.en: Tell me you don't believe that bullshit that he's telling you?
translation.ko: 저 사람이 헛소리하는 걸 다 믿는 건 아니지?

translation.en: are the only thing that matters.
I let the whiskey do the talking.
I guess I just convinced myself that that would put me more in control, but...
translation.ko: 그렇게 생각하면 상황에 대처하기 더 쉽다고 생각했나 봐요

translation.en: It doesn't make me crazy, right?
Why were you looking in my car this morning?
translation.ko: 아침부터 내 차에서 뭘 찾고 있었죠?

translation.en: I wasn't trying to steal your car, Will, if that's what you're after.
translation.ko: 윌, 당신 차를 훔칠 생각은 없어요

translation.en: I saw two kids. I thought that maybe they took something from your car.
translation.ko: 애들 2명을 봤거든요, 당신 차에서 뭘 훔쳐 간 줄 알았어요

translation.en: Where are these kids right now?
I've been running a perimeter every morning since we got here.
translation.ko: 여기 온 이후로 아침마다 주변을 돌고 있어요

translation.en: Come with me, I'll show you.
Must be a volcano around here.
Unless you want to stay, you should come with us.
translation.ko: 여기 있고 싶은 게 아니면 같이 가요
윌, 샘은 여기 있고 싶어 해요

translation.en: I don't see any kids out here.
I'm not the boogie man, Will.
translation.ko: 윌, 난 애들 잡아먹는 귀신이 아니에요
내가 샘 목숨을 살린 거 기억해요

translation.en: We have a bond. That means I get a voice.
translation.ko: 우리 사이에는 유대감이 있어요 나한테 권리가 있다는 뜻이죠

translation.en: Well, I'm not, am I? I'm here.
You don't have to do this.
-OK. OK. Where's Jeremiah? -He tried to kill me. Come on.
translation.ko: - 알겠어, 제러마이아는? - 날 죽이려고 했어, 가자

translation.en: We're gonna make it. No matter what happens, we're gonna make it, OK?
translation.ko: 무슨 일이 있어도 우리는 해낼 거야, 알겠지?

translation.en: Look at me, OK? Look at me.
